用例名称: Verify the order details page of the ticket event and mark the redemption status of the tickets
前置条件:
1. Merchant create a post, add a ticket product to post, publish
2. Consumer visit the post, add ticket product to cart, checkout, place order
步骤描述:
1. 1. Click view order details button on order confirmation page
2. 2. Merchant click the click "Mark as redeemed", and then click "Mark as Redeemed"
3. 3. The ticket inspectors scanned this ticket.
-
-
The merchant enters the "catalogs" section, selects the product, and views the data in the "Orders" tab.
4. 4. Merchant click the "Mark as unredeemed", and then click "Mark as Not Redeemed" -
Merchant checks Sale details
5. 5. The consumer has made a refund, and the merchant is checking the status of the ticket redemption.
预期结果:
1. 1. After opening the "Sale Details" page, the following information is displayed under "Item Info": [Ticket number]
Not redeemed
[CTA]Mark as redeemed
2. 2. After clicking "Mark as redeemed", a pop-up window appeared: Mark item as Redeemed?
Confirm you want to mark this item as redeemed.
[CTA]Mark as Redeemed
-
The merchant successfully marked the ticket as "Redeemed".
3. 3. Write-off failed, displayed:

Code Already Redeemed
[Order ID]
[Ticket number]
[Ticket  cover]
[Ticket  title] [Price x Qty]
Redeemed
[Redeemed date]
[CTA]Scan next ticket
-
The merchant entered the "Orders" tab. The status of this order is: "1 of 1 Redeemed".
4. 4. After clicking "Mark as unredeemed", a pop-up window appeared:
Mark item as Not Redeemed?
Confirm you want to mark this item as not redeemed.
[CTA]Mark as Not Redeemed
-
The merchant successfully marked the ticket as "Not Redeemed".
5. 5. The tickets have already been refunded and cannot be marked.

用例名称: Verify the "Add to shop" flow is correct
步骤描述:
1. A curator creates a post and add products, open the "Post setting" and set the differ commission to promoters
2. Open the "Allow promoters to customize this post by making only their chosen products visible
"
3. publish the post and check the post is display on the associated promoter's sell page
4. Click "Add to shop", check the post can be edit
5. After edit the post after "Publish", check the button display, and check the commission and "Earn up to " is correct
6. Check if the post contains "Subscribe & Save" plan, this section is locked and unable to edit
预期结果:
1. 
2. 
3. 
4. the post can be edit
5. the button display "find in shop" and share to earn
the commission and "earn up to" is display correct on the Sell page / post detail page/ My shop post card / My shop post detail page
6. "Subscribe & Save" plan is locked when promoter "Edit & Promote"

用例名称: Verify that only the original post can generate the scan link
前置条件: The merchant created a ticket product and set up a post, and the promoter resold this post
步骤描述:
1. 1. The merchant clicks "..." on the post card Then click "Create scan link"
2. 2. promoter clicks "..." on the post card
预期结果:
1. 1. The merchant successfully created a san link
2. 2. The promoter cannot be in "..." See the "Create scan link" button

用例名称: Curator successfully copies the store link in "My Shop" and opens it
步骤描述:
1. 1. Curator exist My Shop click the "Share" button next to the store Socials
2. Paste and open in browser
预期结果:
1. Successfully jumped to the shop page
If it is a new user, the follow page will be displayed first; otherwise, it will directly enter the shop page

步骤描述:
1. 1. Curator into My shop

2. Click the Customize shop edit button

3. Enter the correct store name, store description, upload avatar

4. Click the Save button

5. Click "Confirm" button
2. 6. Edit profile, and enter a combination of lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens in the store address and click "Save"
预期结果:
1. Curator successfully customized the store information
2. Saved successfully, the store URL is a combination of lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

用例名称: Verify that the Curator has successfully changed personal information and that the store link will be updated
步骤描述:
1. 1. Curator rexist My ShopIf the page already has data, click the avatar to upload a new picture, and click name enter "New tester"
2. Refresh the entire page, then check to see if the new avatar, new name, and store link change
预期结果: 1. Successfully, the administrator changed the avatar and name in "my shop", the store link did not change

用例名称: Verify modifying a module in Customize shop-Content
前置条件: A module"test1" has been added to the shop page, and there are 6 posts below
步骤描述:
1. 1. Click "my shop-Customize"
2. 2. Select "Content ", click the editing button on the right side of module" test1 ", enter the title "Test1-2 ", then select" Carousel "for Layout style, select "Products" for Content to add, and finally click" Add ".
3. 3. Delete 2 posts, then click "Add from my posts", Select 1 post in "Select from my posts", and then click" Add ".
4. 4. Return to the shop page to view the new module, then share the store link and open it, and use Guest POV to view the new module of the shop
预期结果:
1. 1. Enter the Customize shop page, where there are only three modules: "Storefront", "Content", and "Colors".
2. 2. Successfully edit the module"test1", change the title to "Test1-2", then change the Layout style to "Carousel", and the Content to add is disabled, so it is still "Posts".
3. 3. Successfully deleted two posts for the module "test1-2" and added one new post
4. 4. Curator POV and guest POV both saw the "test1-2"module in the shop with 5 posts, displayed horizontally

用例名称: Verify user can complete and submit the “Contact us” form successfully
步骤描述:
1. 1. User visits the shop page and clicks the “Contact us” entry
2. 2. Fill in all required fields and click Submit
3. 3. System processes the submission
4. 4. Merchant checks their email inbox
预期结果:
1. 1. Page navigates to the form page, showing configured fields
2. 2. User inputs information and clicks Submit
3. 3. Page displays “Submission successful” or similar confirmation
4. 4. Merchant’s email inbox receives a message containing the user’s submitted information

用例名称: Verify the function of generating invitation link
前置条件: The user is on the My Promoters or My Curators page
步骤描述: 1. Click the "Invite more promoters\curatos" button; The Catalog role selects a catalog in Select a catalog and generates an invite link
预期结果: 1. An invite link should be generated with the option to copy or share

用例名称: Verify whether clicking the "Save as draft" button in the lower left corner of the Create Post page can save it as a draft Post
前置条件: The "Set promoter commission" page has been opened
步骤描述:
1. 1.MC enters Create Post 
2. Fill in the required fields 
3. Click the "Save as draft" button 
4. Click the "View in My Shop" button
预期结果: 1. Successfully created a draft Post and jumped to the My shop page

前置条件: The user is logged in and is on the Earnings page.
步骤描述: 1. Check if the Payout tab is visible and accessible.
预期结果: 1. The "Payout" TAB should be visible and accessible, showing "No payout yet" if there is no transfer information, Show the transfer card if there is transfer information and explanation text"It takes 3-5 business days for each transaction to post to your bank account."
